      Methods in org.opensocial.explorer.specserver.api that return GadgetSpec 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GadgetSpec GadgetSpecFactory.create(String specPath)
      Creates a GadgetSpec given the path to the specification.

      Returns the default GadgetSpec object.
